name: Chamber of the Sci-Mutant Priestess
description: Chamber of the Sci-Mutant Priestess (originally entitled Kult: The Temple of Flying Saucers) is a puzzle-solving adventure game. To solve the puzzles, Raven will sometimes need to collect and trade items; but more often, usage of the eight "psi-powers" is required.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Memory: 256 MB RAM
